enhanced_by.reason: Both methods set error-related fields and are often used together to fully define an error code.
setErrorCode internally calls setErrorClass and setErrorNumber, making it a comprehensive setup for error code initialization.
getErrorClass retrieves the error class set by setErrorClass, indicating a state dependency that should be tested.
getErrorCode relies on the error class and number set by setErrorClass and setErrorNumber, making it a dependent method that should be tested after setting the error class.
